mapper.select: SELECT a.id courseId, a.cover, a.title courseName, a.lesson_num lessonNum, a.price, b.NAME teacherName, c.title parentSubjectName, d.title childSubjectName FROM edu_course a LEFT JOIN edu_teacher b ON a.teacher_id = b.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject c ON a.parent_subject_id = c.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject d ON a.child_subject_id = d.id WHERE a.id=#{courseId}

SELECT a.title, a.price, a.lesson_num, a.cover, a.buy_count AS buyCount, a.view_count AS viewCount, b.description, c.id AS teacherId, c.NAME AS teacherName, c.intro, c.avatar, d.id AS parentSubjectId, d.title AS parentSubject, e.id AS childSubjectId, e.title AS childSubject FROM edu_course a LEFT JOIN edu_course_description b ON a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher c ON a.teacher_id = c.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject d ON a.parent_subject_id = d.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject e ON a.child_subject_id = e.id WHERE a.id = #{courseId}
